text:
YouTube is the best place to master AI for free.

Yet most people never find the right videos.

Here are 12 YouTube videos to master AI in 2025:

1. Stanford: Machine Learning  
The gold standard for learning ML basics.  
This course explains the math and logic behind AI.   
Video: https://lnkd.in/djdm9vbr

2. But what is a GPT?  
Breaks down the architecture behind ChatGPT.  
understand how attention works and why it matters.   
Video: https://lnkd.in/dcn5WDDY

3. Large Language Models in brief  
A quick, clear overview of large language models (LLMs).  
See how text prediction creates intelligence.   
Video: https://lnkd.in/dqnRB_iY

4. But what is a neural network?  
A visual, simple introduction to neural networks.  
See how deep learning really works.   
Video: https://lnkd.in/d9dRtfzM

5. Deep Dive into LLMs like ChatGPT   
Learn prompt engineering and the psychology of AI.  
Get advanced tips for using LLMs in practice.  
Video: https://lnkd.in/dkhPnRUp

6. Intro to Large Language Models  
An expert-led, comprehensive guide to LLMs.  
Learn about security, risks, and the future of AI.  
Video: https://lnkd.in/dnjt2Zwn

7. MIT Introduction to Deep Learning  
MIT’s best introduction to deep learning.  
Covers neural networks, computer vision, and more.   
Video: https://lnkd.in/d65XKgmr

8. How ChatGPT writes your thesis in <40 min  
A step-by-step guide to using AI for writing.  
See real examples and advanced prompts.   
Video: https://lnkd.in/ddHt83z6

9. The spelled-out intro to neural networks  
A clear, detailed breakdown of neural networks.  
See every step, from math to code.  
Video: https://lnkd.in/d3H-7zNb

10. Stanford CS229: Machine Learning Course  
Stanford’s legendary machine learning course.  
A deep dive into algorithms and theory.  
Video: https://lnkd.in/dNdjbDrG

11. Deep Learning for Computer Vision  
A full playlist on computer vision.  
Learn how AI sees and understands images.  
Playlist: https://lnkd.in/dp-XVanh

12. AI Search is PRINTING (ChatGPT, GEO & Perplexity)  
Learn about GEO and the future of AI search.  
See how AI search works and who it helps.  
Video: https://lnkd.in/dBREsYdS

You find this list helpful?

♻️ So repost this image to help your network, too.

PS: If you struggle to start, I wrote a beginner's blog to set up your ChatGPT. It's copy & paste instructions.

To access it, go to: https://lnkd.in/dA3FGZjc.
